title: Drawing, "Design for a Plate or a Tondo: Soldiers supplicant before a Roman General", mid-16th century
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk on cream-colored laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Plate or a Tondo: Soldiers supplicant before a Roman General", mid-16th century.
mid-16th century. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk on cream-colored laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2730.
